name: Exercise
info: Exercise is crucial to supporting a healthy metabolism and burning more calories per day. It also helps you maintain your muscle mass and weight loss.

name: Golf
info: Golf exercises your heart and keeps your heart rate up. This will naturally lower your risk for heart disease and other cardiovascular issues.

name: Tennis
info: Through playing tennis, the physical activity can aid in flushing bacteria out of the airways and out of the lungs.

name: Basketball
info: Playing basketball helps to improve motor coordination, flexibility, and endurance. It also encourages speed, agility, and strength.

name: Football
info: The combination of running, walking, sprinting and kicking can bring benefits including increased stamina, improved cardiovascular health.

name: Archery
info: Archery eases arthritis pain for some people through consistent practice and muscle memory. In addition, it improves hand-eye coordination.

name: Swim
info: One of the biggest benefits of swimming is that it truly works your entire body, head to toe. Also, increases your heart rate without stressing your body.

name: Table Tennis
info: Maintains and improves your fitness level. Improves your reflexes and reaction time. It's good for the brain.

name: Run
info: Running Improves Your Health Believe it or not, running is actually a great way to increase your overall level of health.

name: Board Game
info: Board games help the brain retain and build cognitive associations well into old age too. Playing board games is entertaining.

name: Read
info: Reading can lead to a lower heart rate blood pressure, a calmer mind and can bring your stress levels down.

name: Art
info: Art education helps student perform better on assessments, these students show greater flexibility and arability in thinking.
